item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: Hello, World As a first good post this is an intro to me Im a devolper mainly working in python making random things in my spare time. Before this site even went live I managed to delete all of my work in 2 git commands… So a git cheat sheet is a must. Showcase Some projects I have worked on over a long period of time A discord bot for toying around with various other misc WIP ideas - mostly unpublished A KubeJS like mod using jython A projects folder containing unfinished ideas A Curseforge API wrapper for python Some Media Link GitHub
item.content:
Hello, World

As a first good post this is an intro to me

Im a devolper mainly working in python making random things in my spare time. Before this site even went live I managed to delete all of my work in 2 git commands… So a git cheat sheet is a must.

Showcase

Some projects I have worked on over a long period of time

  • A discord bot for toying around with
  • various other misc WIP ideas - mostly unpublished
    • A KubeJS like mod using jython
    • A projects folder containing unfinished ideas
    • A Curseforge API wrapper for python

Some Media Link

  • GitHub
